original_title: ZZ Top - Wanted - Live In New Jersey
overview: ZZ Top live in Camden, NJ during the Beer Drinkers and Hell Raisers Tour in support of the Mescalero album of 2003.  This show was filmed live on May 21, 2003.
tagline: Beer Drinkers and Hell Raisers Tour
title: ZZ Top - Wanted - Live In New Jersey
